name: Navigating by Keyboard
description: Maneuver through the docs with ease using keyboard shortcuts and navigation tips.

steps.title: Navigating by Keyboard
steps.task: You can get anywhere in the docs without touching the mouse. This tour walks you through the key shortcuts.

steps.title: Open Search
steps.task: Press Ctrl+K (or Cmd+K on Mac) to open search from anywhere.
steps.hint: This shortcut works on any page.
steps.learn: Open search instantly with a keyboard shortcut

steps.title: Select Result
steps.task: Use arrow keys to highlight a result, then press Enter.
steps.learn: Jump to any page with Enter

steps.title: Back to Search
steps.task: Press Ctrl+K again to reopen search.
steps.hint: Search is always one shortcut away.

steps.title: Close Search
steps.task: Press Escape to close search without navigating.

steps.title: Keyboard Pro
steps.task: You're now navigating like a pro. Ctrl+K, arrows, Enter, Escapeâ€”that's all you need.
steps.learn: Navigate the entire docs without a mouse
